attributes.action: Stop company ripping lads of there wages  in construction game
attributes.background: The same company time and time again don't pay the workers and those who set up as ltd company or self employed are having this time and time agen ITS TIME IT STOP!!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
